thread.title: BRIEF-Crown Holdings Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.67

title: BRIEF-Crown Holdings Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.67
text:
April 18 (Reuters) - Crown Holdings Inc:
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.67 * Q1 SALES $2.197 BILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $2.05 BILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.80 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES Q2 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.55 TO $1.65 * ADJUSTED FREE CASH FLOW IS CURRENTLY EXPECTED TO BE APPROXIMATELY $625 MILLION FOR 2018 AND $775 MILLION FOR 2019
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $4.42 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.21 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
